==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|か|ど}}

===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/kwado/}} → {{IPAchar|/kado/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かど}} compound {{m|zh|過度|tr=kwa<sup>H</sup>  du<sup>H </sup>|lit=to pass, to go too far + measure, degree}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''guòdù'', or {{etyl|nan|-}} ''kè-tō͘''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|かど|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Adjective===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|かど|hhira=くわど}}

# [[excessive]]

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|かど}}

====Usage notes====
Often used as a noun modifying another noun, with the particle {{ja-r|の}}, rather than with the adjectival particle {{ja-r|な}}. Compare the use of {{cog|en|excess}} and {{m|en|excessive}}.

: {{ja-usex|'''過度'''のストレス、'''過度'''の食欲|'''かど''' の ストレス、 '''かど''' の しょくよく|'''excess[ive]''' stress, '''excess[ive]''' appetite}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かど|hhira=くわど}}

# [[excess]]
